creditline: The Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: black and white photograph of a large hedge with bench inside a cut-away section of hedge; brick path along right side
marks: Signature and Date on back, in pencil: [David Goldblatt / 16/5/93]
title: Remnant of a wild almond hedge planted in 1660 to keep the indigenous Khoi out of the first European settlement in South Africa. Kirstenbosch, Cape Town
